tasks.task: Planting garlic in a no-dig bed and a hugelkultur bed.
subtasks: Gather garlic cloves (both store-bought and elephant garlic).
Prepare the no-dig bed (stereotypical with no digging involved).
Place the garlic cloves 4 inches deep in the no-dig bed.
Space the cloves approximately 7 inches apart.
Prepare the hugelkultur bed (using decaying wood and organic matter).
Plant the garlic cloves in the hugelkultur bed at the same depth and spacing.
Ensure the area is moist (due to the ground being wet).
Avoid watering immediately to maintain moisture, instead covering with soil.

tasks.task: Comparative observation of the two planting methods.
subtasks: Monitor the growth and performance of the garlic in both beds.
Wait for the appropriate time to harvest (implies future video).
Share the experience and results via a video upload.
